data.name: Flail Faster
data.detailed_description:
In Flail Faster, you take on the role of a flail-wielding knight attempting to reclaim an abandoned castle. Each run, battle hordes of monsters by weaving around their attacks and hitting them with your ever-rotating flails. Build a unique arsenal of weapons and powerups each attempt, combining them to achieve powerful synergies. Collect treasure, cast spells, and go into debt in a refreshingly simple yet familiarly challenging dungeon crawling experience.

Features


  • Over 20 unique "Flails", including Boomerangs, Dragon Eggs, and Duct Tape.
  • Over 20 unique passive powerups.
  • Every Flail and Powerup has a unique upgraded version.
  • Battle across multiple elemental environments over the course of a single run, each with its own ensemble cast of monsters to fight.
  • Visit a shop each run with varied contents. Buy too much and you'll go into debt and be cursed until you pay it off!
  • Colorful and engaging boss battles to test your might against.
  • Stunning original soundtrack featuring unique themes for each eccentric boss.
  • Go from a weakling to an invincible killing machine over the course of each 10 minute run--assuming you last that long!

data.short_description: Take back a corrupted castle in this difficult Action Roguelite. Jump and strafe around threatening attacks while simultaneously drafting powerful weapons and upgrades. Only those who flail wildly in the face of danger can truly be called heroes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 512 MB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (or greater) or AMD Radeon HD 7600
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4GB RAM
